transcript:
if you could create one law or rule in
the world that everyone had to follow
what would it be I mean it's a very
simple one but I think be nice and
respectful to everybody I think is
extremely important and sometimes the
world lacks lacks that this is something
that I always remind myself in a way it
comes natural but I think it's super
important to just be nice genuine with
people around you whoever this person is
and um if everybody in the world will be
uh like that I think the world will be a
much better place
